comments:
20040303

If you delete a method that is currently displayed in the SearchView you will 
get the following NPE

Steps
1) Switch to new search view
2) Search for references to a method
3) Delete the method

!STACK 0

The exception was fixed for I2004-03-18.
This introduced the problem that in some cases, stale matches might have
remained in in the search view (with no consequence, really):
